org.vast.data

Class DataIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vast.data.DataIndexer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataArrayIndexer, DataGroupIndexer, DataValueIndexer

    public abstract class DataIndexer
extends Object

    Abstract base class for all Data Indexers
